text: Veepee is a French retail company that sells products through online flash sales, previously known as vente-privee.com until January 2019. == Operation == Founded in 2001 by Jacques-Antoine Granjon and his seven business partners, Veepee specializes in limited-time sales events of designer brands only for its members with discounted prices from 50% to 70% off. The site offers a diverse selection of product categories, including fashion, accessories, toys, watches, home appliances, sports equipment, technology, wines, travel, entertainment tickets, and music. In 2017, the company invested 80 million euros in R&D; and Open Innovation policy, and it rolled out three projects: Veepee Impulse, two in-house Labâ€™innovation, and launched a recruitment plan for 250 IT talents. == References == Category:2006 establishments in France
title: Veepee
